```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
candy_2015 <- read_excel(here("raw_data/boing-boing-candy-2015.xlsx"))
candy_2016 <- read_excel(here("raw_data/boing-boing-candy-2016.xlsx"))
candy_2017 <- read_excel(here("raw_data/boing-boing-candy-2017.xlsx"))
```

```{r}
candy_2015 <- clean_names(candy_2015)
clean_names(candy_2016)
clean_names(candy_2017)
```

```{r}
candy_2015_pivot <- candy_2015 %>%
    pivot_longer(c(butterfinger:york_peppermint_patties, necco_wafers),
                 names_to = "candy", values_to = "rating") %>%
    mutate(
        year = 2015,
        gender = NA,
        country = NA
    )%>%
rename(are_you_going_trick_or_treating = are_you_going_actually_going_trick_or_treating_yourself)%>%
rename(age = how_old_are_you)
```


```{r}
removed_columns_candy_2015 <- select(candy_2015_pivot, -contains(c(
  "please",
  "guess_the_number",
  "that_dress",
  "fill_in",
  "betty",
  "which_day",
  "check_all",
  "if_you_squint",
  "sea_salt",
  "font")
))
```

```{r}
glimpse(removed_columns_candy_2015)
coe
```
